participant_1.background:
I hike and camp with my friends for exercise and to enjoy nature.
i want to be a doctor.
i am a grown woman.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
i have trouble getting along with family.

participant_2.background:
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
i love the game halo.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hi there! I am great, how about yourself?
I am doing well thank you. I am planning a hike for this weekend and I am very excited!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love hiking, it is so peaceful and relaxing.
Me too! I love being in nature and hiking is a great way to get some exercise.
I agree! I also love to camp, do you camp at all?
Yes, I love camping! I have a black lab and we love to go camping together.
Aww, that sounds so cute! I bet your dog loves camping too.
He really does! He loves the outdoors and he is always excited to go camping.
I wish I had a dog, but I am allergic to fur.
Oh that is too bad! Dogs are the best pets.
I know, I wish I could have one. So, what is your favorite thing about hiking?
I love being in nature and being able to see all the beautiful scenery. I also love the exercise and the challenge of hiking.
Those are all great reasons to love hiking! I love the challenge of hiking as well.
Do you have any favorite hiking trails?
I do! I love hiking in the mountains, especially in the fall. The leaves are so beautiful!
Me too! I love hiking in the fall, the weather is usually perfect and the leaves are beautiful.
I agree! I also love hiking in the spring, when everything is green and blooming.
That sounds beautiful! I have not been hiking in the spring in a long time.
You should go! It is so beautiful.
I will have to do that! Thank you for the suggestion.
You are welcome! I am always happy to talk about hiking.
Me too! I love hiking.
I am glad to hear that! I am sure we would be great hiking buddies.
Me too! We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to go hiking with you.
